parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game2</name>=<value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name>version2</name>=<value> 1.51

</value></part><part><name>game3</name>=<value> tkoh

</value></part><part><name>version3</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game4</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version4</name>=<value> 0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Selects a subject page in the [[Diary|diary]]. The subject page is selected but the command does not open the map by default, which could be opened with [[openMap]] if necessary.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>This command seems to be broken in <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.82</value></part></template>. Use [[BIS_fnc_selectDiarySubject]] instead.</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Wiki</title><part><name index="1"/><value>todo</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Remove the above note after 2.03.147165</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> player [[selectDiarySubject]] subject

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> player: [[Object]] - Player

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> subject: [[String]] - subject name, for example "Diary" (see also [[Diary]]). It can be further instructed to select a record too, for example "Diary:Record2".

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if subject was successfully selected

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[openMap]] [[true]]; 
[[player]] [[selectDiarySubject]] "Diary";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[processDiaryLink]] [[createDiaryLink]] [[createDiarySubject]] [[diarySubjectExists]] [[allDiarySubjects]]
</value></part></template></root>
